name: British Airways A319, Belfast City to London Heathrow - UK Domestic
description:
Twitter: @pauls_trips

Snapchat: pauls_trips

In this video, I take the Belfast-London shuttle from Belfast City Airport.

This is a great flight - City airport (formerly Harbour Airport) is only a few miles from Belfast city centre, in the Sydenham district. Much more convenient than the International airport at Aldergrove!

Enjoy the flight!
